parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Use qualitative and quantitative data from testing to:

parts.name: item
parts.prose: Determine the effectiveness of incident response processes;

parts.name: item
parts.prose: Continuously improve incident response processes; and

parts.name: item
parts.prose: Provide incident response measures and metrics that are accurate, consistent, and in a reproducible format.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: To help incident response activities function as intended, organizations may use metrics and evaluation criteria to assess incident response programs as part of an effort to continually improve response performance. These efforts facilitate improvement in incident response efficacy and lessen the impact of incidents.
